sentence: there is a boy laying out on a bench.
he is wearing a karate uniform with a green belt tied around his waist.
two other boys wearing identical uniforms are walking through the door.
they are talking to each other and smiling.
the boy on the bench is frowning.
there is a big clock on the wall above the double doors.
there are words on the double doors.
one of the boys is holding a book bag on his back.
